source.ee0d2080:
from sklearn.model_selection import cross_val_score
knn=[]
for k in range(1,21):
    knn_classifier = KNeighborsClassifier (n_neighbors = k)
    score=cross_val_score(knn_classifier,x,y,cv=20)
    knn.append(score.mean())
